greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 2's in decimal expansion of 2^n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
program: (PARI) Count(x, d)= { local(c=0, f); while (x>9, f=x-10*(x\10); if (f==d, c++); x\=10); if (x==d, c++); return(c) }
{ for (n=0, 1000, a=Count(2^n, 2); write("b065710.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 26 2009
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Dec 04 2001
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2001
